passage_text: 1 The total cost for a basic 200-square-foot screened-in porch will range from $766 to $1,025 or an average cost of $4.48 per square feet. 2  The cost of materials for a top-of-the-line screened-in porch on an existing deck runs between $860 and $1,070 with an installation cost between $297 and $304. 1 The cost of materials for a top-of-the-line screened-in porch on an existing deck runs between $860 and $1,070 with an installation cost between $297 and $304.

1 The cost to build a 16’ x 20’ covered, enclosed porch is approximately $60 to $100 per square foot, or a total of around $16,000 to $32,000. 2  Larger porches generally cost less per square foot while smaller porches tend to cost more per square foot. 1 The cost of a porch could be anywhere from $5,000 for a simple structure or less to $75,000 or more for a sunroom or similar fully enclosed structure. 2  The cost to build a 16’ x 20’ covered, enclosed porch is approximately $60 to $100 per square foot, or a total of around $16,000 to $32,000.

Cost to Screen In Porch. The cost to Screen In Porch averages $4.74 - $6.83 per square foot in 2014. This Screened In Porch Installation cost estimate is calculated from average material costs, unit labor producitivity rates and national average hourly labor wages. To refine the estimate for your Screened In Porch Installation project:

1 The cost of materials for a basic 200-square-foot screened-in porch on an existing deck in most urban areas should run between $470 and $680 with an installation cost between $296 and $345. 1 The cost of materials for a top-of-the-line screened-in porch on an existing deck runs between $860 and $1,070 with an installation cost between $297 and $304.

The average cost to build a porch really depends on what type of porch you want. Costs can range from a couple hundred dollars for a slab of concrete and a rail, to $30,000 or more for a fully enclosed wrap-around porch. Your choice of materials and whether or not you hire a contractor also affect the price. A basic sun porch with a translucent roof that is 6-by-9 feet costs about $6,500. A prefabricated shade porch with a solid roof that is 15 feet wide and 24 feet long costs about $24,000. Shipping can cost anywhere between $650 to $1000, depending on the distance it is being shipped and the weight of the components.

An average construction estimate for a completely new screened-in porch is about $70 per square foot. Therefore, a basic porch (8-foot by 10-foot) with a roof and screen measuring at 80 square feet would begin at a cost of $5,600. The porch design adds anywhere from $2,000 to $3,000 to the cost, and consumers should budget anywhere from $200 to $300 for the permits and city or county inspections. 1 The cost of materials for a top-of-the-line screened-in porch on an existing deck runs between $860 and $1,070 with an installation cost between $297 and $304.

1 According to Hanley Wood and their Remodeling magazine the average porch addition in which a completely covered and enclosed porch is added to the exterior of a home will cost $21,670. 2  The resale value of this update would hold at $18,181 or a nearly 84% return on investment.
